text: Derek Oâ€™Brien (born 13 March 1961) is an Indian politician. He is also a quiz master. He is Member of Parliament in the Rajya Sabha (Upper House of India's Parliament) from West Bengal. He is also a member of the All India Trinamool Congress Party. He is the leader of the All India Trinamool Congress Parliamentary party in the Rajya Sabha. Other than to his Parliamentary career, he became well known as the quizmaster for the Bournvita Quiz Contest and other shows. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from West Bengal Category:Indian Christians Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha Category:Trinamool Congress politicians
title: Derek O'Brien (politician)
